summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and team leadership. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions that improve system performance by 40% and reduce operational costs by 30%. Passionate about mentoring junior developers and implementing best practices in agile environments.

responsibilities: Led a team of 5 engineers in developing a cloud-native microservices platform, reducing deployment time by 60%

Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, improving API response time by 45%
Mentored 3 junior developers, conducting code reviews and pair programming sessions
Collaborated with product managers to define technical requirements and project roadmaps
Developed and maintained 15+ RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, handling 1M+ requests daily
Built responsive web applications using React and Redux, improving user engagement by 35%
Implemented automated testing with Jest and Cypress, achieving 85% code coverage
Migrated legacy monolithic application to microservices architecture on AWS
Participated in agile ceremonies and contributed to sprint planning and retrospectives
Developed full-stack features for a SaaS platform using Django and Vue.js
Designed and implemented PostgreSQL database schemas for multi-tenant architecture
Created automated deployment pipelines using Jenkins and Docker
Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect responsive designs
Reduced application load time by 50% through code optimization and lazy loading
